title: import github.com/looky-cloud/lookytalk
body:
I'm not sure I've got everything in the best location, so weigh in if you have an opinion.

I'm also not sure about package.json. It's just enough to make `import ZQL from "zq/zql/zql.js"` work over in looky-cloud/desktop.

title: Fix default format
body:
PR #5 wired up zsio.LookupWriter() to the -f argument but overlooked
the fact that the default value for -f is "text" and we don't have a
text writer.  Fix it for now by making "table" the default.

title: ZSON reading PROD-1064
body:
A few pieces here are incomplete but can be addressed in follow-ups
- no support for the zson "bytes" type
- no support for descriptors that reference existing descriptors
- no handling of `#sort` directives
- no zson writing
- tests could be more thorough

title: Add top proc
body:
Top is similar to sort | head except that it discards
elements not in the top N elements and is therefore
less memory and cpu intensive.

Top also has a hidden -flush option that will sort return
for every batch, clearing state inbetween batches.

title: move to awk-like command syntax
body:
The command line now expects at least one input file, which can
be specified as "-" for standard input.  Also, we allow the zql
expression to be optional by checking to see if the argument is
a valid file and interpret it as such instead of a search for
the string that represents the file.

Also, we added a brief description for help text.

title: zson writer
body:
These changes allow for reading and writing of zson.  The zeek
reader was refactored into a zson reader that uses a zeek parser
for legacy zeek logs.  This commit also fixes a bug where we
weren't properly handling semicolon termination.  The zeek parsing
tests were broken out into the legacy parsing tests and tests
in zsio for the new zson syntax.

title: change emitter.Emitter.SetWarningsFd to .SetWarningsWriter
body:
The argument to emitter.Emitter.SetWarningsFd is a *os.File, but an
io.Writer suffices.  Change the argument to io.Writer and rename to
.SetWarningsWriter.

title: fix TS_ISO8601, TS_MILLIS handling in NewRawAndTsFromJSON
body:
zson.NewRawAndTsFromJSON does not convert Zeek JSON::TS_ISO8601
timestamps to the standard Zeek format, and it does not handle
JSON:TS_MILLIS timestamps correctly.  Fix both issues.

title: Return count of "dropped" fields from zson.NewRawAndTsFromJSON
body:
With this counter, a caller of `zson.NewRawAndTsFromJSON` can tell when the json input has "extra" fields that are not in the type descriptor. 

This can be useful, for example, to inform the user that a json log has more fields than expected.

title: zval.sizeBytes incorrect
body:
zval.sizeBytes wasn't taking into account bit shifting involved for
the container bit. As a result some values would report a Uvarint size
of 1 byte when with the container bit the size was actually
2 bytes.
